description:
Season Six Match
SAMANTHA SIN
The Python
HT: 5'4
WT: 120 lbs
Season record (0-0)
Lifetime record (2-2)
Not Ranked
PENNY PLAY
The Tarrasque
HT: 5'6
WT: 140lbs
Season record (0-0)
Lifetime record (0-0)
Not Ranked
Samantha is back for season 6: feistier and hotter than ever! Fans love her trash talking skills along with her flexibility and strong leg locks. Penny Play may be a newbie to the US mat, but comes with wrestling experience as well as a weight and height advantage over "The Python".
This will not be your typical new girl match up!
title: Samantha Sin "The Python" (0-0)
